<!-- Scene 0 -->
<speak><p><s><prosody rate="98%">Sun Wukong stood on a mountain top.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="95%">He saw a beautiful cloud made of rainbows.</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="95%">The cloud sparkled with red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple colors.</prosody></s> <break time="500ms"/> <s><prosody rate="105%" volume="+1dB">Sun Wukong wanted to catch it!</prosody></s></p><break time="1s"/><p><s><prosody rate="105%" volume="+1dB">Sun Wukong jumped into the sky!</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="105%" volume="+1dB">He used his magic cloud to fly fast!</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="105%">The rainbow cloud moved away quickly.</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="105%" volume="+1dB">Sun Wukong chased it across the bright blue sky!</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="108%" volume="+1dB">He laughed as he flew higher and higher!</prosody></s></p><break time="1s"/><p><s><prosody rate="92%" volume="-2dB">Sun Wukong reached out his staff.</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="92%" volume="-2dB">He touched the rainbow cloud gently.</prosody></s> <break time="500ms"/> <s><prosody rate="95%">The cloud turned into beautiful colored butterflies!</prosody></s> <s><prosody rate="95%">They flew all around him.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="92%" volume="-2dB">Sun Wukong smiled and watched them dance in the sky.</prosody></s></p></speak>
